channel.title: Tune
channel.description:
Anyone good with music? I'm making a game and I need a tune for walking around and adventuring the map
(it's like pokemon) but i don't want to take there music. If anyone can make a catchy little tune like pokemon that would be great. I can pay around $5 if it's good. Thanks.
any more info needed from me add my skype - roxofan17
